description: Claiming that they had unfinished business to deal with, Tanner and Rowan let the other three guys head out so they could stay back and get into some trouble. They played some strip shuffleboard which got the two pretty naked, pretty quick, then Rowan brought Tanner out back to teach him how to chop some fire wood for the house for later. After some friendly banter the two ended up in the kitchen and basically fucked all day. Tanner fucked Rowan and spun him around a few times taking turns plowing his ass and mouth. By the time the two were done fooling around, the other three stopped in and interrupted their good times. This didn’t stop Tanner who shot his load in front of everyone. All in all, another good day in the mountains.
title: Winter Getaway: Day 3
